answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hello:
I found this website: http://www.humanresources.org/ which might be able to help you. Under HR Resources there is a tab called weblinks. When you click it there are dozens of options for you to choose from that might lead you to what you are looking for. 
For example: http://www.humanresources.org/resources/web-links.cfm
Hope this helps.
Peggy Chasler
Knowledge Network Intern
pchasler@icma.org

author: William Shanahan
text: Do any of you work in a local government with an automated Human Resources Department, either in part of entirely automated?  If so, what services are your provided?  Are your happy with the services?  What is the name of the company that you are using.  What is the annual cost for this service?  Thanks in advance for responding.
title: Automated H.R. Departments
